title.jp: Haha "Tsuyoki de!" / Suzu, Sunglasses Kaketai / Haha, Shinheiki ga Suki

synopsis: Mom wants to teach the children the power of 'I can' thinking... Mom shows the family their true ultimate secret weapon. Yuzu is dying to see himself in sunglasses, but the World has other plans...

title.jp: Mikan, Shokika Sareru / Kono Machi mo Nagai wa ne / Chichi wa Utsuu ga Ookii

synopsis: Who knew that multi-tasking could be this hard?! It’s been ten years and the memories have piled up—both good and bad. Even the most lenient husbands have their limits...

title.jp: Yuzupi no Okaa-sama / Haha-tachi no Bowling / Haha no Kenmaku ni Youchuui

synopsis: Yuzu’s fanclub tries to imagine the wondrous woman who raised their idol... Mom and her friends put their money where their mouth is... When your mother’s intensity is at complete odds with the subject at hand...

title.jp: Kawashima, Omajinai / Mizushima-san, Wakai / Jibun no Oshiri wa Jibun de ne

synopsis: Yuzupi’s fan club has a new charm to get his attention... Tricks to look younger, or just looking younger? Mom is getting tired of her irresponsible family and she’s got a new plan.

title.jp: Haha, Saeteru Hi / Yuzu-tachi, Eiga ni Iku / Otoko-tachi no Heiwa

synopsis: Every mom will have her day. Everyone’s got that one friend... When you hold your tongue you hold the peace.

title.jp: Haha to Jigsaw Puzzle / Mikan, Yobimachigai / Kantan Arange Ryouri

synopsis: Mom gets sucked in by the jigsaw demon. When you and your teacher both call people by the wrong name. Don’t mess with Mom’s food.

title.jp: Odeko, Pikkaa / Haha, Tsumekae no Tensai / Otoko-tachi no Rokotsu

synopsis: Mom's got a shiny forehead to match her shiny personality... Did the room just get brighter? Is Mom good enough to become the world champion refiller the world needs and deserves? Nowadays, everybody avoids being direct so as not to be blunt. However, Dad and his friend think that that's not always the best...

title.jp: Shiraga wo Nuite / Yuzu wa Amae Heta / Chichi wa Haha no Doko ga?

synopsis: The fine tradition of daughters pulling out gray hairs. Yuzu wants to know the big secret. What attracts us to someone isn't always easy to explain...

title.jp: Haha, Hanshin'yoku / Yoshioka Urayama! / Haha no Kaifuku Hou

synopsis: Mom's version of the hip bath is scary... Whoever thought Mikan would be envious of Yoshioka. Families can be so cruel...

title.jp: Sudou-chan no Megane / Donuts Boom / Saikin Kyoumi Aru Koto

synopsis: Fujino just wants a girl to think he's funny... It's the holey experience... What are you into these days?

title.jp: Mikan, Madofuki Shokunin / Haha, Mushi Komi / Haha, Tatoe Heta

synopsis: Mom awakens the window cleaning pro in Mikan, but Mom's greed ends Mikan's cleaning career prematurely. Mom draws on the hive intelligence to make crucial decisions too often. Mom just can't get the hang of coming up with appropriate examples for her excitement.

title.jp: Bear Ken no Christmas / Haha, Kan de Ikiru Genshijin / Iwaki-kun to Christmas Cake

synopsis: Will Mikan ever meet her Christmas miracle again? Mom teaches Mikan how technology dampens your intuition. The most boring Christmas ever is about to take	a drastic turn for Mikan.

title.jp: Tachibana-ke no Ganjitsu / Gochounai Mochitsuki Taikai / Mijikasugiru Oshougatsu

synopsis: The family has their own special brand of New Year's traditions... Knowledge is powerful, but for mochi pounding, that's not all you need... So many hopes, so much to do, so little time...

title.jp: Soudan Shinai Chichi / Haha, Nou Tore / Danshitte, Yaane

synopsis: Dad just does dad things when his whim strikes... The brain training actually works, but maybe it shouldn't have? Boys really have a one-track mind....

title.jp: Haha, Ikken Boutto Shiteru / Nasuo no Chara Ben / Korette Non-Kimo?

synopsis: No, she's thinking about important things! Nasuo's embarrassed by his mom's bento lunch at first, but then... The line between creepy and not is not always clear...

title.jp: Haha, Hen ni Kan ga Ii / Otoko-tachi no Omou Tsubo / Ganbare Beam

synopsis: Good intuition and good timing don't always go hand in hand. When it all goes according to plan. Mom's not going to let the small businesses down.

title.jp: Takkun no Setsubun / Mikan wa Yabo / Horohoro Toriwake Jiken

synopsis: Yuzu is very careful to not crush Takkun's euphoria for demons. For Mikan, too many times, asking is silver, silence is gold. The guinea fowl is so good that it leads to a downward spiral of silliness.

title.jp: Haha-tachi, Jukensei no Oya / Mikan no Valentine / Yuzu, Shin'ya no Otoko Meshi

synopsis: Sometimes, school exams stress the parents more than the kids. Is Mom's little girl growing up? The best snacks are had in the dead of night.

title.jp: Mikan Tetsudaitakunai / Chichi no Yasashisa Otoroeru Koto Nashi / Hamburg Tabetai

synopsis: Why doesn't Mikan want to help around the house? Only Mikan's noticing the little things. Let the meaty torture begin!

title.jp: Yoku Taberu Takkun / Chichi, Haha, Trekking / Mikan, Tama Wasureru

synopsis: Takkun only eats what Yuzuhiko eats. Hiking is so relaxing. Oh wait, Mom's along... Were Mikan and Yuzu switched at birth?

title.jp: Kasa no Smart na Kaeshi Kata / Ima Nande Waratta no / Yuzu, Ankoku Sekai

synopsis: Finding the perfect setting for returning umbrellas is harder than it seems. Mikan just really wants to know why you just laughed. Yuzu falls into a hateful parallel universe.

title.jp: Chichi wo Sassaru Haha / Usagi no Rakugaki / Kasa wo Mochitakunai Yoshioka

synopsis: Mom and Dad can communicate telepathically. Or can they? Yuzuhiko discovers the intoxicating world of doodling. The day he takes an umbrella is the day he stops being himself.

title.jp: Zettai Kigatsukanai / Haha, Shittakaburi / Yuzu Fan no Seichi

synopsis: Like mother, like daughter. Do mothers really know best? They might be making a mountain of a molehill.

title.jp: Haha no Surprise Present / Yuzuhiko, Yakyuubu (Zenpen) / Yuzuhiko, Yakyuubu (Kouhen) (母のサプライズプレゼント / ユズヒコ, 野球部 (前編) / ユズヒコ, 野球部

synopsis: Mom's on a mission for the perfect birthday present. Yuzu's school has a phantom baseball club. The Phantom Club has two die-hard fans.

title.jp: Onsen Slipper / Yoshioka, Sakana Kirai / Yuzu no Yobikata

synopsis: Trying to hold on to 'your' slippers is harder than it seems. With friends like these, who needs enemies? When mom gives you weird nicknames, you just have to go with it.

title.jp: Kono Ie wa, Watashi no Shiro! / Mikan, Ohanami / Minna no Yume

synopsis: Mom is a tyrannical ruler in the house who can't be argued with. Or can't she be? Mikan and her friends try to see what all that fuss about this event is about. Everybody has a dream that gets them excited, even dad.
